revision.text: <onlyinclude>* '''{{LE|PuzzleItem.Number}}''' ''value'' :Defines the number that has to be used with [[UsePuzzleItem]] to identify the item. * '''{{LE|PuzzleItem.FailMessage}}''' ''string'' :Message to be displayed when this item is used and not the one requested by [[UsePuzzleItem]]. * '''{{LE|PuzzleItem.FailSound}}''' ''sound'' :Sound to be played when the item is used, but is not the one requested by UsePuzzleItem. Default is the [[player class]] specific *puzzfail sound.</onlyinclude> [[Category:Editing references]]
